verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] betting Beijing will blink first in the showdown over tariffs . Such an outcome is far from assured -- and it could also take a while .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: betting] [ARG2: Beijing will blink first in the showdown over tariffs] . Such an outcome is far from assured -- and it could also take a while .
President Donald Trump is betting Beijing [V: will] blink first in the showdown over tariffs . Such an outcome is far from assured -- and it could also take a while .

President Donald Trump is betting [ARG0: Beijing] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: blink] [ARGM-TMP: first] [ARGM-LOC: in the showdown over tariffs] . Such an outcome is far from assured -- and it could also take a while .
President Donald Trump is betting Beijing will blink first in the showdown over tariffs . [ARG1: Such an outcome] [V: is] [ARG2: far from assured] -- and it could also take a while .
President Donald Trump is betting Beijing will blink first in the showdown over tariffs . Such an outcome is far from [V: assured] -- and it could also take a while .
President Donald Trump is betting Beijing will blink first in the showdown over tariffs . Such an outcome is far from assured -- and it [V: could] also take a while .

President Donald Trump is betting Beijing will blink first in the showdown over tariffs . Such an outcome is far from assured -- and [ARG0: it] [ARGM-MOD: could] [ARGM-DIS: also] [V: take] [ARG1: a while] .
